document.masterDocTitle: Oribatid mites (Acari: Oribatida) recorded from Ireland: Catalogue, historical records, species habitats and geographical distribution, combinations, variations and synonyms

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Oribatid mites (Acari: Oribatida) recorded from Ireland: Catalogue, historical records, species habitats and geographical distribution, combinations, variations and synonyms

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Steganacarus ( Atropacarus ) striculus
(C.L. Koch, 1835)
*

· Original name:
Hoplophora striculus C.L. Koch, 1835
.
· In: Deutschlands Crustaceen, Myriapoden und Arachniden, 2(10).

·
Steganacarus (Atropacarus) wandae (Niedbała, 1981)

· Original name:
Steganacarus wandae Niedbala, 1981
.
· In: Deux nouveaux Phthiracaridae ( Acari , Orbatidae) originaires de la Pologne. Bulletin de l'academie

polonaise des sciences serie des sciences biologiques , 28 (12), 699–766. · Historical combinations/variations:
Atropacarus wandae (Niedbala)
Arroyo et al. 2012
· Synonyms:
Steganacarus navarrensis Moraza, 1985
.
Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Moss, bracken, soil on cliff and woodland (Bolger In press); moss on

soil surface in oak forest (
Arroyo et al . 2012
, 2013b ).

·
Hoplophthiracarus pavidus (Berlese, 1913)

· Original name:
Hoploderma pavidus Berlese, 1913
.

· In: Acari nuovi. Manipoli VII-VIII.
Redia ,
9, 77–111.
· Historical com

· binations/variations:
Calyptophthiracarus pavidus (Berlese) Balogh and Mahunka, 1983
;
Notophthiracarus ( Calyptophthiracarus ) pavidus (Berlese) Subías, 2004
.

· Synonyms:
Hoplophthiracarus illinoisensis (Ewing, 1909)
(?);
Hoplophthiracarus cretensis Mahunka, 1979
;
Calyptophthiracarus cretensis inopinatus Mahunka, 1991
. Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Soil from Norway spruce forest ( Heneghan 1994 ). Counties: Kilkenny.

·
Phthiracarus ( Phthiracarus ) affinis
(Hull, 1914)
*

· Original name:
Hoploderma affinis Hull, 1914
.
· In: British Oribatidae . Notes on new and critical species. Naturalist , 1914, 215–288.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Phthiracarus affinis (Hull)
Turk, 1953.

·
Phthiracarus ( Phthiracarus ) dasypus
(Dugès, 1834)

· Original name:
Oribata dasypus Dugès, 1834
“sp. inq.”.
· In: Recherches sur l'ordre des Acariens. Troisième Mémoire. Annales des Sciences Naturelles ( Zool ), (2), vol. 2, 18–63.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Ginglymacarus dasypus (Dugès) Ewing, 1917
,
Hoploderma dasypus (Dugès) Halbert, 1907
.

· Synonyms:
Hoplophora maxima Haupt, 1882
.

paragraph.materialsCitation: Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Moss ( Halbert 1907 ); Counties: Dublin .

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Phthiracarus ( Phthiracarus ) ferrugineus
(C.L. Koch, 1841)
*

· Original name:
Hoplophora ferrugineus C.L. Koch, 1841
.
· In: Deutschlands Crustaceen, Myriapoden und Arachniden , Vol. 32 (10).

· Historical combinations/variations:
Phthiracarus ferrugineus (C.L. Koch) Jacot, 1936
.

Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Soil from Norway spruce forest ( Heneghan 1994 ; Heneghan and Bolger, 1996 ; McCarthy 2004); fungal sporocarps ( O’Connell 1994 ; O’Connell and Bolger 1997 ; unpublished data).

·
Phthiracarus ( Phthiracarus ) laevigatus
(C.L. Koch, 1844)

· Original name:
Hoplophora laevigatus C.L. Koch, 1844
· In: Deutschlands Crustaceen, Myriapoden und Arachniden, 38.

materialsCitation.location: Clare, Kerry, Kildare, Limerick, Laois, Galway, Roscommon, Tipperary and Wicklow
materialsCitation.stateProvince: Clare, Kerry, Kildare, Limerick, Laois, Galway, Roscommon, Tipperary and Wicklow

paragraph.materialsCitation: Counties: Clare, Kerry, Kildare, Limerick, Laois, Galway, Roscommon, Tipperary and Wicklow .

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Phthiracarus ( Phthiracarus ) longulus
(C.L. Koch, 1841)

· Original name:
Hoplophora longulus C.L. Koch, 1841
.
· In: Deutschlands Crustaceen, Myriapoden und Arachniden , Vol. 32 (17).
Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Fungal sporocarps ( O’Connell 1994 )

·
Phthiracarus ( Archiphthiracarus ) anonymus
Grandjean, 1933
*

· Original name:
Phthiracarus anonymus Grandjean, 1933
.

· In:
Phthiracarus anonymum
n. sp.
Revue Française d’Entomologie, 1, 51–58.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Paraphthiracarus anonymus (Grandjean) Aoki, 1980
;
Archiphthiracarus anonymus (Grandjean) Balogh and Mahunka, 1983
;
Pthiracarus anonymus
[sic] (Grandjean) Arroyo and Bolger, 2011.

· Synonyms:
Phthiracarus anonymus amicus Jacot, 1938
;
Archiphthiracarus pocsi Mahunka, 1983
;
Archiphthiracarus hauseri Mahunka, 1988
.

Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Forest soil fermentation layer ( Parry 1979 ),
Salix
ditch at seashore (Purvis 1982); fungal sporocarps ( O’Connell 1994 ; O’ Connell and Bolger 1997 ); soil from Norway spruce forest ( Heneghan 1994 ); mixed Norway spruce and Lodgepole pine forest (
Arroyo et al . 2009b
); machair foredunes (Arroyo and Bolger 2011); moss in canopy of oak and Scots pine forests and soil and moss on soil in Sitka spruce forests (
Arroyo et al . 2012
, 2013b ); moss on trunk in yew forest and moss on soil in oak forest (
Arroyo et al . 2013c
); canopy in ash forests (unpublished data).

materialsCitation.location: Clare, Derry, Galway, Kerry, Kilkenny, Laois, Roscommon, Sligo, Wexford and Wicklow
materialsCitation.stateProvince: Clare, Derry, Galway, Kerry, Kilkenny, Laois, Roscommon, Sligo, Wexford and Wicklow

paragraph.materialsCitation: Counties: Clare, Derry, Galway, Kerry, Kilkenny, Laois, Roscommon, Sligo, Wexford and Wicklow .

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Phthiracarus ( Archipthiracarus ) bryobius
Jacot, 1930

· Original name:
Phthiracarus setosellum bryobium Jacot, 1930
.
· In: Oribatid mites of the subfamily Phthiracaridae of the Northeastern United States . Proceedings of the Boston Society of Natural History, 39 (6), 209–261.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Phthiracarus bryobius (Jacot) Jacot, 1938
;
Pthiracarus bryobius
[sic] (Jacot) Arroyo and Bolger, 2011.

Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Machair grassland (Arroyo and Bolger 2011); moss in canopy of Scots pine forest (
Arroyo et al. 2012
, 2013b ).

·
Phthiracarus ( Archiphthiracarus ) globosus
(C.L. Koch, 1841)

· Original name:
Hoplophora globosa C.L. Koch, 1841
.
· In: Deutschlands Crustaceen, Myriapoden und Arachniden , Vol. 32.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Hoploderma globosum (C.L. Koch) Michael, 1898
;
Phthiracarus globosum (C.L. Koch) Willmann, 1931
;
Phthiracarus globosus (C.L. Koch) Willmann, 1931
.

paragraph.materialsCitation: Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Soil from Norway spruce forest ( Heneghan 1994 ). Counties: Kilkenny .

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Phthiracarus ( Archiphthiracarus ) montanus
Pérez-Íñigo, 1969

· Original name:
Phthiracarus montanus
Pérez- Íñigo, 1969.

· In: Nuevos oribátidos de suelos españoles ( Acari, Oribatei ).
EOS
,44, 377–403.

· Historical combinations/variations:
Pthiracarus montanus
[sic] (Pérez- Íñigo) Arroyo et al ., 2013.

Irish Reference/s and Habitat/s : Fungal sporocarps ( O’Connell 1994 ); soil from Norway spruce forest ( Heneghan 1994 ); machair grassland (Arroyo and Bolger 2011); moss on soil in ash, oak, Scots pine and Sitka spruce forests, moss in canopy in oak and Scots pine forests, soil in Sitka spruce forests and canopy in ash and Sitka spruce forests (
Arroyo et al. 2012
, 2013b ); moss in canopy in oak forest and moss on soil, moss on trunk, canopy and moss in canopy in yew forest (
Arroyo et al. 2013c
); canopy in ash forests (unpublished data).

materialsCitation.location: Clare, Donegal, Kerry, Kilkenny, Laois, Roscommon, Sligo and Wicklow
materialsCitation.stateProvince: Clare, Donegal, Kerry, Kilkenny, Laois, Roscommon, Sligo and Wicklow

paragraph.materialsCitation: Counties: Clare, Donegal, Kerry, Kilkenny, Laois, Roscommon, Sligo and Wicklow .

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Phthiracarus ( Archiphthiracarus ) stramineus
(C.L. Koch, 1841)
“sp. inq.” *

· Original name:
Hoplophora straminea Koch, 1841
.
· In: Deutschlands Crustaceen, Myriapoden und Arachniden, Vol. 32 (13).

· Historical combinations/variations:
Phthiracarus stramineus (C.L. Koch) Jacot, 1936
;
Archiphthiracarus stramineus (C.L. Koch) Balogh and Mahunka, 1983
.

· Synonyms:
Phthiracarus clavatus Parry, 1979
;
Phthiracarus opacus Niedbała, 1986
;
Phtiracarus clavatus
[sic] (Parry) Arroyo et al ., 2013.

materialsCitation.location: Dublin, Kerry, Mayo, Offaly and Roscommon
materialsCitation.stateProvince: Dublin, Kerry, Mayo, Offaly and Roscommon

paragraph.materialsCitation: Counties: Dublin, Kerry, Mayo, Offaly and Roscommon .

subSubSection.paragraph:
·
Steganacarus ( Steganacarus ) magnus
(Nicolet, 1855)
* · Original name:
Hoplophora magna Nicolet, 1855
.
· In: Histoire naturelle des Acariens qui se trouvent aux environs de Paris. Archives du Muséum d’Histoire Naturelle, Paris, 7, 381–482.
Counties : Dublin , Clare , Cork , Kerry , Kilkenny , Laois , Limerick , Mayo , Offaly , Roscommon , Sligo , Tipperary , Wexford and Wicklow .

·
Steganacarus ( Steganacarus ) michaeli
Bernini and Avanzati, 1987

· Original name:
Steganacarus michaeli Bernini and Avanzati, 1987
.

· In: Notulae Oribatologicae XLI. Some new
Steganacarus
species belonging to the magnus group (Acarida, Oribatida ). International Journal of Acarology , 13(3), 165–176.
